verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H2930>them<s%>, There shall none defile himself for the <S%H5315>dead<s%> among his <S%H5971>people<s%>;

except for his <S%H7607>kin<s%>, that is <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H517>him<s%>, for his mother, and for his <S%H1>father<s%>, and for his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and for his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and for his <S%H251>brother<s%>,
and for his <S%H269>sister<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, that is <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, that hath had no husband; for her may he defile <S%H2930>himself<s%>.
He shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H1167>himself<s%>, being a chief man among his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to profane <S%H2490>himself<s%>.

They shall not <S%H7139>make<s%> <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon their <S%H7218>head<s%>, neither shall they shave <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of their <S%H2206>beard<s%>, nor <S%H8295>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

They shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto their <S%H430>God<s%>, and not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>; for the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>, they do <S%H7126>offer<s%>: therefore they shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

They shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> that is a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, or <S%H2491>profane<s%>; neither shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> put <S%H1644>away<s%> from her <S%H376>husband<s%>: for he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto his <S%H430>God<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him <S%H7126>therefore<s%>; for he offereth the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>: he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>: for I Jehovah, who <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6918>you<s%>, am holy.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, if she <S%H2490>profane<s%> herself by playing the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, she <S%H2490>profaneth<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%>: she shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And he that is the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> among his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, upon whose <S%H7218>head<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%>, and that is <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> to <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H899>garments<s%>, shall not let the hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> go <S%H6544>loose<s%>, nor <S%H6533>rend<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>;
neither shall he go <S%H935>in<s%> to any <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%>, nor <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself for his <S%H1>father<s%>, or for his <S%H517>mother<s%>;

neither shall he go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, nor <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>; for the <S%H5145>crown<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is upon <S%H3068>him<s%>: I am Jehovah.
And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> in her <S%H1331>virginity<s%>.

A <S%H490>widow<s%>, or one <S%H2491>divorced<s%>, or a profane <S%H1644>woman<s%>, a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, these shall he not <S%H3947>take<s%>: but a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of his own <S%H5971>people<s%> shall he <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And he shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> among his <S%H5971>people<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who sanctifieth <S%H6942>him<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> he be of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> that hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, let him not <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>.

For whatsoever <S%H376>man<s%> he be that hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, he shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%>: a <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, or a <S%H6455>lame<s%>, or he that hath a flat <S%H2763>nose<s%>, or anything <S%H8311>superfluous<s%>,
or a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7667>broken-footed<s%>, or <S%H7667>broken-handed<s%>,

or <S%H1384>crook-backed<s%>, or a <S%H1851>dwarf<s%>, or that hath a <S%H8400>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5869>eye<s%>, or is <S%H1618>scurvy<s%>, or <S%H3217>scabbed<s%>, or hath his <S%H810>stones<s%> <S%H4790>broken<s%>;

no <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, shall come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>: he hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>; he shall not come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>.
He shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>, both of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and of the <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

only he shall not go <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H6532>veil<s%>, nor come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, because he hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>; that he <S%H2490>profane<s%> not my <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who sanctifieth <S%H6942>them<s%>.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
